metadata.Title: CVE-2023-30410 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Jerryscript commit 1a2c047 was discovered to contain a stack overflow via the component ecma_op_function_construct at /operations/ecma-function-object.c.

criterions.comment: iotjs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
